title: Gravity Intro (Beginner)
intro: Let's explore the basics of gravity. Gravity is like a super-strong magnet pulling things together.
outro: Well done! You've grasped the beginner level of gravity concepts.

concepts.name: Gravity Basics
concepts.explain: Gravity is similar to a magnet attracting objects towards each other. It's the force that keeps us on the ground and makes things fall when we release them.
concepts.example: Imagine a ball rolling down a slope. Gravity is the reason the ball moves down instead of up.

check.question: What is gravity compared to in the simplified explanation?
